thread.title: New Jersey Governor Promises Measures to Prevent School Violence

author: Leslie Brody
title: New Jersey Governor Promises Measures to Prevent School Violence

organizations.name: new jersey governor promises measures to prevent school violence
new jersey school security task force

text:
New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy said Tuesday he would seek to improve coordination among schools, law enforcement and state agencies to prevent school violence.
In response to the deadly school shooting in Parkland, Fla., last week, the Democratic governor gathered top members of his team and legislative leaders for a news conference in Trenton. He reiterated his pledge to fight for stricter gun-control laws.
